content: --अंतर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} constant, perpetual, uninterrupted, incessant; निरंतराधिपटलैः <ls>Bv. 1. 16</ls>; निरंतरास्वंतरवातवृष्टिषु <ls>Ku. 5. 25.</ls> {2} having no intervening or intermediate space, having no interval, close, closely contiguous, in close contact; मूढे निरंतरपयोधरया मयैव <ls>Mk. 5. 15</ls>; हृदयं निरंतरबृहत्कठिनस्तनमंडलावरणमप्यभिदन् <ls>Śi. 9. 66.</ls> {3} compact, dense; <ls>Śi. 16. 76.</ls> {4} coarse, gross. {5} faithful, true (as a friend). {6} not hidden from view. {7} not different, similar, identical. {8} sincere, sympathetic; <ls>Pt. 1. 341.</ls> (--रं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {1} without interruption, constantly, continually, incessantly. {2} without intervening space or interval. {3} closely, tightly, firmly; (परिष्वजस्व) कांतैरिदं मम निरंतरमंगमंगैः <ls>Ve. 3. 27</ls>; परिष्वजेते शयने निरंतरं <ls>Rs. 2. 11.</ls> {4} immediately.
